thread.title: Tech News Weekly 363: DOJ Wants Google To Sell Chrome
thread.title_full: Tech News Weekly 363: DOJ Wants Google To Sell Chrome

author: TWiT
title: Tech News Weekly 363: DOJ Wants Google To Sell Chrome
text:
Nov 21st 2024
Tech News Weekly 363
DOJ Wants Google To Sell Chrome
Hosted by
[Mikah Sargent](/people/mikah-sargent),[Jennifer Pattison Tuohy](/people/jennifer-pattison-tuohy)Echo Show 21, AI Robotics, Windows 365 Link
Records every Thursday at 2:00pm Eastern / 11:00am Pacific / 19:00 UTC.
Guests:
Zac Bowden,Leah NylenJennifer Pattison Tuohy of The Verge joins Mikah Sargent this week! Amazon announces the new Echo Show 21 and the Echo Show 15 smart displays. Is AI allowing the robotics revolution to come to fruition? Microsoft announces the Windows 365 Link mini desktop PC. And will the DOJ get Google to sell off Chrome following the DOJ's call to divest the company?
- Jennifer Pattison Tuohy talks about Amazon's announcement of the Echo Show 21 and Echo Show 15 smart displays.
- Mikah Sargent talks about how AI is powering a robotics revolution as more organizations are utilizing robots, thanks to AI.
- Zac Bowden from Windows Central joins the show to talk aobut Microsoft's Windows 365 Link, a mini desktop that runs Windows 11 through the cloud.
- And Leah Nylen, Antitrust Reporter for Bloomberg, stops by to talk about the Department of Justice and Google and how the DOJ is calling for Google to divest and start with the sale of Chrome.
Download or subscribe to Tech News Weekly at https://twit.tv/shows/tech-news-weekly.
Get episodes ad-free with Club TWiT at https://twit.tv/clubtwit
